verses.verse: Don't<WH8055> rejoice, Israel,<WH3478> to jubilation<WH1524> like the nations;<WH5971> for you were unfaithful to your God.<WH430> You love<WH157> the wages<WH868> of a prostitute<WH2181> at every grain threshing floor.<WH1637>
The threshing floor<WH1637> and the winepress<WH3342> won't<WH7462> feed them,<WH8492> and the new wine will fail her.<WH3584>
They won't<WH3427> dwell in Yahweh<WH3068>'s land;<WH776> but Ephraim<WH669> will return<WH7725> to Egypt,<WH4714> and they will eat<WH398> unclean<WH2931> food in Assyria.<WH804>

They won't<WH5258> pour out wine<WH3196> offerings to Yahweh,<WH3068> neither will they be pleasing<WH6149> to him.<WH2077> Their sacrifices will be to them like the bread<WH3899> of mourners;<WH205> all who eat<WH398> of it will be polluted;<WH2930> for their bread<WH3899> will be for their appetite.<WH5315> It will not come<WH935> into the house<WH1004> of Yahweh.<WH3068>
What will you do<WH6213> in the day<WH3117> of solemn<WH4150> assembly,<WH3117> and in the day of the feast<WH2282> of Yahweh?<WH3068>

For,<WH1980> behold, they have gone away from destruction.<WH7701> Egypt<WH4714> will gather them up.<WH6908> Memphis<WH4644> will bury<WH6912> them.<WH7057> Nettles will possess<WH3423> their pleasant<WH4261> things of silver.<WH3701> Thorns<WH2336> will be in their tents.<WH168>

The days<WH3117> of visitation<WH6486> have come.<WH935> The days<WH3117> of reckoning<WH7966> have come.<WH935> Israel<WH3478> will consider<WH3045> the prophet<WH5030> to be a fool,<WH191> and the man<WH376> who is inspired<WH7307> to be insane,<WH7696> because of the abundance<WH7230> of your sins,<WH5771> and because your hostility<WH4895> is great.<WH7227>

A prophet<WH5030> watches<WH6822> over Ephraim<WH669> with my God.<WH430> A fowler<WH3352>'s snare<WH6341> is on all of his paths,<WH1870> and hostility<WH4895> in the house<WH1004> of his God.<WH430>
They have deeply<WH6009> corrupted<WH7843> themselves,<WH3117> as in the days of Gibeah.<WH1390> He will remember<WH2142> their iniquity.<WH5771> He will punish<WH6485> them for their sins.<WH2403>

I found<WH4672> Israel<WH3478> like grapes<WH6025> in the wilderness.<WH4057> I saw<WH7200> your fathers<WH1> as the first ripe<WH1063> in the fig tree<WH8384> at its first season;<WH7225> but they came<WH935> to Baal<WH1187> Peor,<WH5144> and consecrated themselves to the shameful<WH1322> thing,<WH5144> and became abominable like that which they loved.<WH157>
As for Ephraim,<WH669> their glory<WH3519> will fly away<WH5774> like a bird.<WH5775> There will be no birth,<WH3205> none with child,<WH990> and no conception.<WH2032>
Though they bring up<WH1431> their children,<WH1121> yet I will bereave<WH7921> them,<WH120> so that not a man shall be left.<WH188> Indeed, woe also to them when I depart from them!<WH5493>
I have seen<WH7200> Ephraim,<WH669> like Tyre,<WH6865> planted<WH8362> in a pleasant place;<WH5116> but Ephraim<WH669> will bring out<WH3318> his children<WH1121> to the murderer.<WH2026>
Give<WH5414> them<WH3068>â€”Yahweh what will you give?<WH5414> Give<WH5414> them a miscarrying<WH7921> womb<WH7358> and dry<WH6784> breasts.<WH7699>

"All their wickedness<WH7451> is in Gilgal;<WH1537> for there I hated<WH8130> them.<WH7455> Because of the wickedness of their deeds<WH4611> I will drive them out<WH1644> of my house!<WH1004> I will love<WH160> them no more.<WH3254> All their princes<WH8269> are rebels.<WH5637>

Ephraim<WH669> is struck.<WH5221> Their root<WH8328> has dried up.<WH3001> They will bear<WH6213> no fruit.<WH6529> Even though they bring forth,<WH3205> yet I will kill<WH4191> the beloved<WH4261> ones of their womb.<WH990>"
My God<WH430> will cast them away,<WH3988> because they did not listen<WH8085> to him;<WH5074> and they will be wanderers among the nations.<WH1471>
